name: NetRacer
description:
Requires a Commodore 64 with RR-Net or 64NIC+ cartridge.  Also playable in VICE with RR-Net Emulation.

Background
  • Scene World LIVE: networked C64 Games
  • Commodore 64 users create perfect nerdstorm :-)
  • NetRacer on CSDb
  • NetRacer on GameBase64
Developer Info
  • Presentation from C4 Expo 2008
